wikipedia_page.main: Kevin Rayne is an English former professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1970s, 1980s and 1990s. He played at representative level for Great Britain and Yorkshire, and at club level for Wakefield Trinity (Heritage № 816), Leeds and Doncaster, as a prop, or second-row, i.e. number 8 or 10, or, 11 or 12.

response: Keith Rayne is the twin brother of the rugby league footballer, Kevin Rayne.
